column4: good day Y'all, new install of Ubuntu one disc, no other O/S on my mobo, system monitor says ,, network history, received 1.1 MiB , sent 8.8KiB, its road runner direct conected , ethernet, but I cant get any programs online like Firefox,, Any Ideas ??
